name: TheEntrepreneur'sCPAwithTrevorMcCandless
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Entrepreneur's CPA discusses tax, bookkeeping and finance topics that are actionable and impactful to entrepreneurs.

Hard working, persistent entrepreneurs, armed with a solid business foundation & strategy, can grow thriving businesses around their ideas. And that they have been under-served—and perhaps even disregarded—by accountants in this regard.

That’s where The Entrepreneur's CPA comes in.

Host Trevor McCandless specializes in tax translation. Creative entrepreneurs can learn how to think about their financial numbers, and the tax effects that result from their everyday transactions. Through this amazing process, we'll literally change the way tax professionals service their clients. 

As an entrepreneur, Trevor knows what his clients go through. To-do lists upon to-do lists. Balancing revenue growth, expense efficiency, cash flows, employee management, not to mention a personal life with your friends & family! In order to grow, entrepreneurs must delegate & surround themselves with the best & the brightest. Specialists in sales, marketing, finance, insurance, law, accounting and TAX!

Trevor has been called by Brooke Fritz of Mint Moxie “the tax accountant you’ve been dreaming of your entire life.” Now you can put that level of expertise to work for your business with The Entrepreneur's CPA Flash Briefing
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
